{{cpp/error/error_category/title|equivalent}}
{{cpp/error/error_category/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl | since=c++11 | num=1 | 1=
virtual bool equivalent( int code, 
                         const std::error_condition&amp; condition ) const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl | since=c++11 | num=2 | 1=
virtual bool equivalent( const std::error_code&amp; code,
                         int condition ) const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Checks whether error code is equivalent to an error condition for the error category represented by {{c|*this}}.

@1@ Equivalent to {{c|1=default_error_condition(code) == condition}}.
@2@ Equivalent to {{c|1=*this == code.category() &amp;&amp; code.value() == condition}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | code | specifies the error code to compare}}
{{par | condition | specifies the error condition to compare}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if the error code is equivalent to the given error condition for the error category represented by {{c|*this}}, {{c|false}} otherwise.
